archive.hotbar.warps.desc: Right-click t' open the warps interface, ye scallywag!
archive.hotbar.teleport.desc1: Left-click: Teleport forward, like a swift breeze!
archive.hotbar.teleport.desc2: Right-click: Teleport through, like passin' through the seas!
archive.hotbar.apple.desc: 15 minutes o' seein' in the dark, like a keen-eyed pirate!
archive.hotbar.milk.desc: Drink this grog t' get rid o' effects, like night vision, ye landlubber!
archive.hotbar.rwarp.desc1: Warp t' a random spot on the seas!
archive.mainmenu.title: Warps
archive.mainmenu.lobby.desc3: P529? Arrr, they did naught but drink the rum!
archive.mainmenu.2016.pre: Founded in the year o' 2016 before the June winds
archive.mainmenu.2016.post: Founded in the year o' 2016 after the June winds
archive.mainmenu.new: Newly added to the treasure trove!
archive.mainmenu.axes: Along the Axes, like a compass rose
archive.mainmenu.unclear: The startin' date be lost t' the seas
archive.mainmenu.nether: Nether Spawn, a fiery place for daring pirates
archive.mainmenu.end: The End Spawn, where the kraken awaits
archive.mainmenu.const: Constantiam Server, the land of legends
archive.header.row1: §7A grand collection o' builds from the servers
archive.footer.row1: §7The clock in yer hotbar opens the /warps gui, ye seadog
archive.footer.help: §6/help §7[§62§7|§63§7] fer help with the commands, aye!
archive.footer.contact: §8contact: §7write.the.archive@gmail.com, send yer message in a bottle!
